name: Satyabrata Pradhan
text: Nice pizza place. You can custom made ur pizza with the toppings u want. The service is well behaved and nice for all the people. The dough is made fresh and all veges are fresh. They have a small room available which can be used if u have a party to arrange. Will definitely come back to this again and again.

name: David Mills
text: Food is good cheese is pretty good considdering its vegan you cant really tell giod quality dough made daily and good quality toppings only down side is there lemonade is subpar only reason its grtying 4 stars not 5

name: Matt Gough
text: Great pizza, and exceptional service!

name: Raena Ellerbe
text: Great pizza! I like it better than buddy's pizza and half the price. Vegan pizza option. I built my own pizza for $7.95. Each of my family members got their own pizza. My pizza was so delicious! I am allergic to dairy. It was awesome to finally eat round pizza. Great staff and service.

name: Matka Silverman
text: Finally a pizza place that offers vegan cheese and gluten free crust. It is kind of like Subway. One flat price lets you pick as many delicious toppings as you want. Your personal pan pizza cooks in about 5 min. Lots of topping choices as well as thin and thick crusts. Menu limited to pizza, salad, cheese bread and dessert bread.

name: Arthur A
text: Overall experience was good. The food has been okay to good, the service was okay, but I think that also has to do with their turnover rate. The wait times are a little long cause they seem to never have enough people working.

name: BIL Schmitz
text: Great fresh ingredients. Happy staff. It's a good place and they have vegan options. All other pizza places should be worried. With this place close I have choices for my vegan wife and two pizzas with all the toppings I want is cheaper that 2 pizzas from a competitor and taste much better.

name: Adam Awesomeface
text: Amazed.  I showed up not knowing what to think and I was greeted by the staff and asked how I was in such a poliete but not pushy way it instantly put me in a great mood.  Instead of simply asking what I wanted the staff helped guide me by …More

name: Austin Frank
text: Pieology has quite a bit of menu selections as far as "build you own pizza" places go. They have gluten free crust as well as whole wheat. There is also a "pie rise crust" that is pretty good if you don't like the thin style crust, but it's …More

name: Tiffany R. McCants
text: I went here when they first opened and did not have a good experience.  The customer service was good, but the pizza was not good.  I went again last week and saw a drastic improvement in the pizza.  I had quite honestly the best pizza I've …More

name: Kaitlyn
text:
Pizza is always delicious and staff is always friendly!
Love building my own pizza for $8. Can't get all the toppings i like anywhere else for that cheap.

name: Pete A
text: Good pizza, made to order, quick and hot, fast service very friendly staff. They also offer Military discounts which is a plus for all that served, support and work for the men and women that keep us and our country safe. Thank you Pieology Pizzeria of Warren, Michigan.

name: AJ AX
text: You build it pizza like at a sub or sandwich shop but with a real pizza oven, and beer. Plus they win points in our book for having Dr pepper, coke zero and cherry cola. Fair prices and nicely prepared toppings, lots of vegetable choices.

name: B Fielder
text: Pizza is very good with lots of options. Good prices. Only issue is the ordering process is kind of slow.

name: Mike T.
text: Pizza was awesome!!! It's like going to Q-Doba or Subway. All fresh ingredients right there to choose from. Pick your dough, sauce, meats, vegetables etc cooked in the oven and serves fresh. Quick turn around, highly recommend.

name: Zaahid Muhammad
text: The best pizza service and food I have had in a really long time. From the kind customer service to the friendly management really made the experience! Thanks again Mike for the excellent food!

name: Chris Biddle
text: The staff is very nice.  It took a very long time to order.  Once we finished ordering the food arrived very quickly.  In general I won't come back here because while the food is good. It is just too much food.  I would rather go to …More

name: Ryan Murphy
text: Pizza was kind of wet and I was served the wrong beer. I think the lines were connected to the wrong keg. MOD is much better, but Pieology is a slightly different style of pizza.

name: Damn it Dee! H
text: Food was great!! Servjc was terrible. Where in the heck do they find these people with such nasty attitudes?

name: Erlyb Ydrah
text: Build your own pizza! Awesome taste & options for a great price. Tight parking.

name: Scott Sikorski
text: We prefer to make our own pizza. Ussually get one for each of us and still take home about 1 whole pizza. Toppings/ingredients are tasty and highquality!

name: Mike Moore
text: Nice pizza.  Service can be slow sometimes especially if they accidently drop the pizza :-)

name: David Dumm
text:
I think the food is good if the employees don’t ruin the business. Toppings for salads and pizzas were not
Available because chicken not thawed out for salads and tomatoes not cut up. …More

name: Baowinator orororo
text: Sooo goood. Build your own pizza. I noticed there are a lot of pizza joints like this popping up, but so far I like Pieology the most! The employee here was super friendly as well.

name: Rantz Redd
text: Friendly service. All fresh unlimited ingredients made to order for one price!

name: Tracey Morris
text: Always good pizza here with fresh ingredients, tons of options, and consistent care in preparation, all at a great price. Shorter wait times in the evening. I recommend ordering in person - the order app can be a little glitchy.

name: Candace Burton
text: Best place ever...  Customer service is outstanding.

name: keith ancrum
text: Food was excellent,and great customer service however around lunchtime they may need additional personnel for the lunch crowd.

name: Ali M Saleh
text: Every is great about this place and their pizza is awesome!

name: Steven Benoit
text: Good staff, clean dinning area and an outstanding pizza.  Well done, it is now my favorite pizza restaurant.

name: Jennifer Morikawa
text: Love selecting the pizza toppings and the exotic lemonade options.

name: Greg Wing
text: Always good pizza. Good staff

name: Ted Kennedy
text: I love the look of the place ! Good drinks and food !

name: John Tockstein
text: Pizza tasted great in the center because they load to much in the center, and leave edges slim.

name: Tricia
text: Ordered a side salad food was fresh however it was not rec'd as described just came with lettace, sun dried tomoto and parm cheese? …More

name: D Griffin
text: It's Pieology!  So darned good...  Just wish they delivered.

name: Jessica Davis
text: First time there b4 the employees super nice, and the pizza was amazing. I'll be back soon.

name: Mike Zuidema
text: Custom Pizza and a pint $10 happy hour special!

name: Nicolai
text: Great Pie. Pile the toppings on no extra charge...

name: Duane Westermann
text: First time customers, now will be lifetime customers. Food was great, and service was outstanding. Na-Statsha ( I think is how her name is spelled) was very friendly and checked up on us to see if everything was ok. We were loyal to Blaze pizza but found a new favorite place.

name: Toxic Toucan
text: Very very slow compared to Mods. Food was good though.

name: SuperRandomandstupid
text: Great staff..they really earn the tips they recieve. And the pixza is wonderful

name: Alana Dansby
text:
Good food
Fast service
Fairly cheap
Gluten-free dough available

name: Kay Simone
text: Love the setup and the professional and friendly service, my new favorite pizza place.

name: Liberty Massey
text: Awesome pizza and great price!

name: garrett menzel
text: Great pizza , great fun , and great price

name: Joe Beydoun
text: Good place to eat, nice decor, pizza tastes pretty good.

name: Lisa Ingram
text: Fast friendly professional clean and delicious!

name: Toi Sapp
text: It's good but not as good as Blaze.

name: Scott Semposki
text: Great pizzas, plethora of toppings and fast polite customer service!

name: Jeffrey Knop
text: Great and fast service, excellent food and they offer a Military discount.

name: Master Mind
text: The best part is they deliver.

name: Mike Douglas
text: Service there sucks they, the pizza is pretty good but they didn't make my food twice  when I called it in.

name: Bre
text: Great service they get you  in and out.

name: Danielle James
text: Great pizza and you get to choose what you want

name: Julian Suliman
text: Delicious

name: Tiffany Austin
text: Great little pizza place where you can customize your Pizza with a wide variety of fresh toppings

name: Dorel Tataru
text: Great pizza! Nice place

name: MissionSparta
text: Great food, great workers...giving great service.

name: alexander price
text: Great place to go always love the personal pizza

name: CES S
text: First time. Was very good  had wheat crust chicken breast and other goodies

name: Mike McGuire
text: Amazing pizza place...my new favorite

name: Nanc A
text: Good pizza, fast and pleasant service.  Will be back

name: James Carr Jr.
text: Great food and great service!

name: Travis Hill
text: Thursday, August 23 2018. Website says they close at 10:00pm. I get here at 9:30pm. Doors are locked...what a disappointment.

name: Sam Brooks
text: Fast pizza reasonably priced

name: J Thagreat
text: Good service good pizza.

name: Mark Sapian
text: Thin crust is always too done and burnt. Way to much garlic in everything.

name: Melanie Lusnak
text: Good pizza that you can customize

name: Gurpreet Nanda
text: Fabulous pizzas and quick service

name: Andrew H
text: Fast and fresh! Good pizza

name: Chris Kersten
text: Made to order pizza, tastes good.

name: Tom Novak
text: Service is always awesome! Food is even better!

name: Keith Ryals
text: Very friendly staff ,wide asortment of toppings Suggestion there is nothing wrong with variety but have the old stand bys available Also for a pizza that just came out a fire roasted oven it got cold quickly

name: stappy jon
text: If you are military you have to be in uniform for the 50 percent discount.

name: Brian Scobie
text:
Not as good as I was hoping for,  I think that 1000 degrees pizza is much tastier,  it's okay,  maybe they were having a bad day so I may try it again
I guess nobody else liked it either, I drive  by it and it's now closed

name: Blair Wilson
text: Always a great experience!

name: jerred thill
text: So delicious, wish it was closer

name: Kenneth Frizzell
text: Good place to eat

name: Grafton Russell
text: Pizza was not great

name: william sullivan
text: Employees act as if they don't care took 15 mins to get my salad dressing.

name: Nick Symonette
text: Awesome pizza!

name: Shannon Hill
text: Food was delicious

name: Laurie Jablonski
text: Average

name: Tyler Ensign
text: LOVE this place!!

name: Rosalind Elledge
text: WONDERFUL!!!!

name: Albert Clawson
text: Large sign in window says now open, all lights are on, doors are locked. If they are closed today there should be another sign on the door.
